lines.text:
[after being rescued]
Whew! I don't know what I'd do without you, Lieutenant. Say, how'd you find me here anyway?
What d'you think a police department's for? Or maybe someday you'll learn to keep your nose out of our business.
I promise I won't get in your way.
Come a pinch and you'll fold up. A dame'll do it every time!

[She takes out a gun]
A check for a short beer.

[to Seidel]
Why, your kennels aren't fit for a dog.
I know I agreed, but I'm no longer agreeing because you're off this case!
